name: Skyballs
description:
Use the wrecking ball tied to your ship to destroy your enemy! 

This game was developed for Game Zanga 8, a 48-hour game jam. Theme: minimalism.

Player 1: W to accelerate, A and D to rotate

Player 2: Up arrow to accelerate, Left and Right to rotate

---

Design, Code and Art by Carl Farra

Music and sound attributions:

"Long Time Coming" by Kevin Macleod

"Super Power Cool Dude" by Kevin Macleod

"Bottle Rocket" by Mike Koenig 

"Blast" by Mike Koenig
